
# Домашнее задание к занятию "14.1 Создание и использование секретов"

1.   
  ```
	cluster-admin@node1:~/Desktop$ kubectl get nodes
	NAME    STATUS   ROLES           AGE   VERSION
	node1   Ready    control-plane   42d   v1.24.2
	node2   Ready    control-plane   42d   v1.24.2
	cluster-admin@node1:~/Desktop$ openssl genrsa -out cert.key 4096
	Generating RSA private key, 4096 bit long modulus (2 primes)
	..................++++
	.......................................++++
	e is 65537 (0x010001)
	cluster-admin@node1:~/Desktop$ openssl req -x509 -new -key cert.key -days 3650 -out cert.crt \
	 -subj '/C=RU/ST=Moscow/L=Moscow/CN=server.local'


	cluster-admin@node1:~/Desktop$ kubectl create secret tls domain-cert --cert=cert.crt --key=cert.key
	secret/domain-cert created
	
	
	cluster-admin@node1:~/Desktop$ kubectl get secrets
	NAME                               TYPE                 DATA   AGE
	domain-cert                        kubernetes.io/tls    2      13s
	sh.helm.release.v1.nfs-server.v1   helm.sh/release.v1   1      21d
	
	
	cluster-admin@node1:~/Desktop$ kubectl get secret
	NAME                               TYPE                 DATA   AGE
	domain-cert                        kubernetes.io/tls    2      24s
	sh.helm.release.v1.nfs-server.v1   helm.sh/release.v1   1      21d
	
	
	cluster-admin@node1:~/Desktop$ kubectl get secret domain-cert
	NAME          TYPE                DATA   AGE
	domain-cert   kubernetes.io/tls   2      39s
	
	
	cluster-admin@node1:~/Desktop$ kubectl describe secret domain-cert
	Name:         domain-cert
	Namespace:    default
	Labels:       <none>
	Annotations:  <none>

	Type:  kubernetes.io/tls

	Data
	====
	tls.crt:  1944 bytes
	tls.key:  3243 bytes
	cluster-admin@node1:~/Desktop$ kubectl get secret domain-cert -o yaml
	apiVersion: v1
	data:
	  tls.crt: 
	  tls.key: 
	kind: Secret
	metadata:
	  creationTimestamp: "2022-08-05T03:35:42Z"
	  name: domain-cert
	  namespace: default
	  resourceVersion: "888565"
	  uid: 95ae8158-7bc5-499e-b5f2-4be6b6a4f4af
	type: kubernetes.io/tls
	cluster-admin@node1:~/Desktop$ kubectl get secret domain-cert -o json
	{
		"apiVersion": "v1",
		"data": {
			"tls.crt": "",
			"tls.key": ""
		},
		"kind": "Secret",
		"metadata": {
			"creationTimestamp": "2022-08-05T03:35:42Z",
			"name": "domain-cert",
			"namespace": "default",
			"resourceVersion": "888565",
			"uid": "95ae8158-7bc5-499e-b5f2-4be6b6a4f4af"
		},
		"type": "kubernetes.io/tls"
	}
	cluster-admin@node1:~/Desktop$ kubectl get secrets -o json > secrets.json
	
	
	cluster-admin@node1:~/Desktop$ kubectl get secret domain-cert -o yaml > domain-cert.yml
	
	
	cluster-admin@node1:~/Desktop$ kubectl delete secret domain-cert
	secret "domain-cert" deleted
	
	
	cluster-admin@node1:~/Desktop$ kubectl get secrets
	NAME                               TYPE                 DATA   AGE
	sh.helm.release.v1.nfs-server.v1   helm.sh/release.v1   1      21d
	
	
	cluster-admin@node1:~/Desktop$ kubectl apply -f domain-cert.yml
	secret/domain-cert created
	
	
	cluster-admin@node1:~/Desktop$ kubectl get secrets
	NAME                               TYPE                 DATA   AGE
	domain-cert                        kubernetes.io/tls    2      3s
	sh.helm.release.v1.nfs-server.v1   helm.sh/release.v1   1      21d

  ```
